You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while leaving a decoy behind.

The decoy acts as the spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.WPXzPl7YbMEIGWfi]{Mislead}, though you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, just @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}. You can continue to concentrate to move your decoy, as with the spell, whether or not you remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} throughout the duration.

Once you use Perfect Distraction, you need to spend 10 minutes to set up another decoy before you can use it again.
